vote.title: Authorize the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to (1) acquire, develop, and own Banyan Flats, a mixed-income, multifamily development to be located at 2020 North Beckley Avenue (Project); and (2) enter into a seventy-five-year lease agreement with Bishop Arts JV, LLC or its affiliate, for the development of the Project - Estimated Revenue Foregone: General Fund $2,277,286.00155,356.00 (15 Years of Estimated Taxes For 75 years; see Fiscal Information)
